Delete these %1$s folders and all their contents?

Slide up again to go beyond 100%
Increasing playback speed over 1 for streams may cause stuttering
The speed will be applied to all videos.\nIndividual videos\' playback speed will be ignored.
The speed will be applied to all tracks.\nIndividual tracks\' playback speed will be ignored.
You are in incognito mode. The speed will revert to normal when you leave incognito mode.
The speed will be applied to this video only
The speed will be applied to this track only
Use the playback speed set globally for all the tracks.\nIndividual tracks\' playback speed will be ignored.
Wait for current media item to finish first
%1$s, wait media end: %2$s, reset on interaction: %3$s
Add a new server to favorites
Enter network address: e.g. http://, mms:// or rtsp://
This media is from a unavailable storage and cannot be played.
Save all media played in History section
Allow saving the video play queue to resume later

Disabling the audio play queue history may lead to some behavior issues.
After disabling it you may not be able to resume the playback from:

	- a bluetooth device
	- the widget
	- the media notification

Disabling the playback history will hide the history, the media progress and the seen markers. The app will continue to save your activity and it will be restored if the history is turned back on.\nIf you want to completely stop saving your activity, use the incognito mode instead.\nYou can also clear your history in the history screen or in the advanced settings.
Allow saving the audio play queue to resume later
Tap on player controls below to discover what they are used for
Tap to change the video aspect ratio
Such as the playback speed, repeat mode, …
Double tap to go 10 sec forward or backward
VLC for Android™ is a port of VLC media player, the popular open source media player. The Android™ version can read all files and network streams.
Select directories to include in the media library
Enter additional custom directory to scan:

Banning this folder means that you won\'t see its media in the video or audio section of the app, though they will still be accessible from the browser.\nTo unban it, go to the settings, %s and long tap this folder.
Disabled: better stability\nDecoding: may improve performance\nFull: may improve performance further
Force hardware decoder, for advanced users only
Settings when secondary displays are connected (HDMI/Chromecast)
Clone the device screen without remote control
Show new video title on transition
Mark a video as seen when you play it until the end
Play all videos, starting with the one you clicked on
Play all audio, starting with the one you clicked on
Save individual audio delay for each video
Control brightness by gesture during video playback
Control volume by gesture during video playback
Show rewind and fast forward buttons on the video interface
Show speed control in the overflow menu
Show rewind and fast forward in the overflow menu. Try holding steering wheel previous and next buttons before enabling.
Double tap on screen edges to seek by 10 seconds
Double tap on screen center to play or pause
Swipe your finger across the screen to seek
Zoom in and out with two fingers
Keep screen ON in Pop-Up mode
Always keep screen ON while Pop-Up is displayed, even if video is paused.
Tap and hold to increase the playback speed
Show buttons to navigate between bookmarks
Show bookmark markers over the timeline
Show buttons to navigate between chapters
When available, set the current media cover art as lockscreen wallpaper
Show rewind and fast forward buttons in compact media controls
Streams without replay gain information may be quieter due to the default gain
Track mode plays streams with replay gain information at the same loudness. Album mode preserves relative stream loudness on the same album.
Changes the default target level (89 dB) for streams with replay gain information
Applies to streams without replay gain information\nSet to 0 to disable
Change the method that VLC uses to output audio
Helps to hear audio notifications, navigation instructions or assistant talking
Tap to see the server status
Let your TV manage audio rendering
Select the conversion quality when casting on remote screen
Split lists by headers depending on the sort type
Show folders and then files in the file browser
Show hidden files in the file browser
Fast seek is enabled. It can lead to precision issues
Changing the deblocking filter settings could improve video quality (advanced users only)
Speed up decoding but could lower video quality
Speed up and slow down audio without changing the pitch (requires a fast device)
Automatically scan device for new or deleted media at application startup
Copy database to internal storage root
Clears the database to start over
You will lose your history, your current playlists and your progresses
The amount of time to buffer network media (in ms) for software decoding\nSet to 0 to disable
Blurred cover in audio player background
Force shuffling when launching a playback
This value must be between 0 and 60000 ms
Changes will take effect once application has restarted.\n\nRestart now?
Add a quick play action in the browser items\' menu. It will load your media faster but some metadata may be missing
If activated, taping a browser item will play it using quick play
Unfortunately, a serious error has occurred and VLC had to close.
Help us improving VLC by sending the following crash log:
The media library just crashed. Help us by sending the logs.
Do you want to delete this subtitle?
OpenSubtitles is currently unavailable. Please try again later
Apply for all the play queue
Change UI to TV adapted theme
What\'s new in VLC for Android %s
The equalizer has been reworked from scratch. It\'s easier to use, lets you disable the default presets and allows you to backup, restore and share your presets.
We improved the backup and restore settings feature. It now lets you backup more settings, including the equalizer presets.
Due to some new store constraints, the Android Auto settings have all been moved to the mobile application. It becomes the new place to change your automotive experience.
A new nightly release of VLC for Android is available!\n\nYou\'re seeing this because you are using a nightly build.
Nightly versions are updated automatically everyday with the latest features and fixes.\n\nDownload now?
Nightly builds are experimental versions updated everyday.\n\nExpect new features but also new bugs!
You are running a nightly version. Would you like to periodically look for updates?
Press Back again to quit video
Good news! We released improved widgets.\nThey offer more responsiveness and customization

We detected that you already have widgets on your launcher. Unfortunately, they are not compatible with our new improved ones.\nDepending on your launcher, you may have to remove the old ones to replace them.
Allow VLC to access video and audio files
VLC needs you to grant this permission to access the media files on this device.
VLC cannot access all of your files
Starting with Android 11, applications need a special permission to access all device\'s files.\n\n%s
Never show again, even for future versions
Allow VLC to set the ringtone
VLC needs you to grant this permission to set up this song as your ringtone.
Allow VLC to change brightness mode
VLC needs you to grant this permission to change your brightness mode.
Allow VLC player popup over other apps
VLC needs you to grant this permission display your video in a popup over other applications.
Allow VLC player to launch the Picture in Picture
VLC needs you to grant this permission to display your video in Picture in Picture mode.
You won\'t be able to auto-discover your media nor use external subtitles
You will be able to only play streams or network media
You won\'t be able to auto-discover your media.\nYou will be able to only play streams or network media
You will only be able to auto-discover standard media files
You will be able to auto-discover all your files to play all types of media even weird ones, or compressed files
Are you sure you want to quit VLC?
The widgets come in different sizes and flavors
To change the widget type, long press it and use the handles to resize it to the size you like
Widgets are heavily customizable. Unleash your creativity and make them look like you!
No item to display, go to your extension settings to get some.
By default, OpenGL ES2 is used for software decoding and hardware decoding when needed (360° videos)
Warning, encryption is not available for this Android version, password will be stored in a private space but not encrypted
Play video in a Pop-Up window
You are not logged into OpenSubtitles\nLogging in will grant you access to more downloads
You have %1$s remaining downloads out of %2$s. Your limit will be reset at %3$s.
You are a VIP OpenSubtitles user
Long press OK button to check/uncheck directories
Do you want VLC to add device %1$s to your medialibrary?
Equalizer-set with this name already exists
Medialibrary is scanning your devices right now
You have to grant VLC write access to your SD Card
VLC cannot delete this file without write access permission.\nPlease go to your SD Card and click on \"Select\".\nYou may have to click on \"Show SD card\" first in the top-right menu
Failed to change Audio Digital Output state
Stop playback when application is dismissed
Shows a tip helping you to resume audio playback on app start
Choose whether VLC will scan your device storage to organize your media library or just use it as a simple player with an integrated browser.
You just plugged a new storage device to your TV box, do you want to open it with VLC?
The free and open source multimedia player
VLC needs your permission to access media on your device
VLC needs your permission to access video media on your device
VLC needs your permission to access audio media on your device
VLC can automatically scan your device to organize your media collection.
Without the storage permission, VLC cannot retrieve the media title nor save the progress
You can now auto-discover your media, use external subtitles as well as play streams or network media
VLC will automatically switch to dark mode accordingly with system setting
VLC will automatically switch to night mode at appropriate time
Let VLC scan my device for media content
Let me choose which folders VLC will scan
Restore video from background when reopening VLC for Android
Are you sure you want to delete this playlist?
Keep the incognito mode enabled even if the app is restarted
Database dumped on internal storage root
By sending your crash, you will help us improve VLC stability.
Make sure you remove any sensitive data you don\'t want to send.
Welcome in VLC beta program.\nPlease note this version may have some bugs.
If you notice a bug, please report it in our forum or bug tracker.
If you experience a bug or a crash, please open the About screen and Use the Feedback > Contact the support team button.
What do you want to do?
Please describe how this crash happened
You will lose your progresses, bookmarks and the playlists you created but you will keep your VLC for Android settings
You will lose your progresses, bookmarks, playlists and all VLC settings
I would like this to be a monthly sponsorship
Your sponsorship will allow us to:\nImprove the VLC app for Android\nSupport the VideoLAN Association
You are subscribed to a monthly sponsorship
You can unsubscribe in the Play Store
To unsubscribe, please open %s on a phone or a computer or scan this code:
Thank you for your sponsorship!\nIt will help us a lot improving VLC!
Please select your OTG drive to allow access to VLC.
Uncheck this setting if you have some difficulties browsing your SMB server

Audio delay set to %s ms for the bluetooth device

Show distant media even if they are not present
When activated, files cannot be deleted or playlist modified without entering the pin

Your pin code should only contain digits
First, let\'s create your PIN code

Match display refresh rate to media frame rate. For example, a 24p film should play at 24p

Beta features that are currently being tested and may not be stable
This feature is in beta and may cause crashes and instabilities

Network indexing is currently in beta.
Known issues:
• Slow performance

If you encounter some other issues, please report them on our forum.
When the orientation is locked, use the sensor to allow the reverse orientation

VLC needs your permission to send notifications.\nThe app will only notify you when scanning your media or using the custom video Picture in Picture.\nRefusing it won\'t prevent VLC to work, however the notifications will be hidden.
To enable this, you have to disable the standard media file access first
To enable this, you have to disable the full file permission first

resources.string: Seek is faster but may be less precise
Switching to the mobile interface can only be done with a tactile screen or a mouse.\nPlease slide below to verify that this feature is safe to change.
You can scan this on your smartphone.\nThe URL is %s
Palette (pulls colors from the media cover)
This widget type is too large for the widget size. It can lead to visual issues
Even if it\'s not shown, you can tap the upper right corner to open the configuration
Video player. Tap to show controls. Tap the back button to hide them
Useful, for instance, if you are using a headset with broken physical buttons
Application is not in foreground. Cannot launch video.

Make sure to accept the certificate to be able to use the remote access

Access requests for the remote access
If it\'s you, enter this code on the other device
Welcome in VLC for Android\'s remote access\nBy enabling it you will be able to control this device\'s playback and more
Control your device playback, send or retrieve files and more
The remote access is encrypted to prevent your data from leaking
With the one time password authentication, prevent unwanted access to your data
Choose what can be accessed and what can\'t
You need to log in on your device

Podcast controls appear when playing a single track which meets one of the following criteria:
	• Length greater than 60 min
	• Length greater than 15 min with no album name
	• Genre is %s

VLC can be controlled through Google Assistant by speaking the following commands:
	• Play, Pause, Stop, Previous, Next
	• Rewind, Fast Forward, Repeat <all|one|off>
	• Jump to <time>, Skip <duration>
	• What's this <artist|album|song>
	• Play [artist|album|song|genre|playlist] <name>
Action for streams when the connection is metered
Warn me (the warning may be missed for audio playback)
Media stopped because the connection is metered
Your connection is metered. Fees may apply.
Export your settings to a file to import them later
Restore your settings from a previous export
Your settings export is obsolete. Please export them again
Settings exported successfully to the internal storage root
Something went wrong while exporting your settings
Some settings have been moved to the video controls settings in the video player.
Contact the support team by email
Your feedback report has been generated
Tap the button below to send it using your default email client. If you encounter any issues, you can copy paste the fields below and send the email yourself.
You just downloaded the needed file. Please remember to attach it to your email.
The easiest way to share your feedback is to use the %1$s feature.\nTo do so, enable the remote access in the settings, follow the instructions and choose the %2$s entry in the menu.
